content: Center level contribution margin, which we define as total revenue less external provider costs and cost of care, excluding depreciation and amortization, was $21.4 million for the first quarter compared to $42.3 million in the first quarter of fiscal 2022 and $23.6 million in the fourth quarter of fiscal 2022. Adjusted EBITDA, which we calculate by adding interest, taxes, depreciation and amortization, onetime adjustments for transaction and offering related costs and other nonrecurring or exceptional costs to net income was a negative $3.8 million compared to $18.2 million in the first quarter of fiscal year 2022 and negative $600,000 in the fourth quarter of fiscal year 2022.
